creator: matthias.buchner@gmail.com
text:
hi,

I used PropertyPrinter to write a modified config file.
I can see that a few config variables are defined in the created file (set with
the default value) and that the name of some of then have been modified.
Everything could be ok but one of the variable added by the class
PropertyPrinter is causing some problems. 
When I try to read the new file with PropertyConfigurator, I have the following
error message: 
log4j:WARN Failed to set property [contentType] to value "text/plain".

Regards,
Matthias

creator: thorbjoern@gmail.com
text: Could you please provide sample code demonstrating the issue you are reporting?  Preferrably as an attached zipfile
